album.title: One Love: The Very Best Of...

track.name: Waiting In Vain
comments: Check out this awesome cover of Waiting in Vain by The Anywheres
This is real music that reaches your soul and spirit stop listening to nonense.
"in life i know there's lots of grief, but your love is my relief" nothing more to add
Ever time I listen to this, I get goosebumps all over. I can feel what Bob is singin about.
feels good hearing this mourn n .....aaahhhhhhhhhhhhh
One of the best Bob Marley songs ever... <3  NESTA!
FOREVER and EVER will this be my song... <3
Probably one of my favourite songs ever.
one of the greatests Bob songs :)
Don't miss this brilliant fresh mashup by Mighty Mike - Waiting in Heaven (Bob Marley vs. The Cure) : http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FiUb7hmX7vE&hd=1
I dont wanna wait in vain!  Just, great song :] i love it, seriously :]
one of my most favorite songs by bob
